title: What score are you all expecting in EPD ESA?
content: Since other subjects' esa were fine, epd was truly a disaster for me, and tbh I am getting distracted from chem prep due to that. How much are you all expecting in EPD?

comments.body: Letting yourself get distracted by a past poor ESA performance would be one of the worst things you could doâ€”speaking from experience.
Y'all chickened out in 1st sem itself ?  nah
